name: Groopie
description: Female Startup Club is a modern media company and platform dedicated to empowering professional women with the tools, resources, and community they need to build financial security and achieve economic independence. With our innovative data engine driving insights and product development, we connect and inspire women globally to take control of their financial futures, creating a world where every woman can thrive on her own terms.
one_liner: Female Startup Club is a modern media company and platform dedicated to empowering professional women with the tools, resources, and community they need to build financial security and achieve economic independence. With our innovative data engine driving insights and product development, we connect and inspire women globally to take control of their financial futures, creating a world where every woman can thrive on her own terms.
